name: WeekdagCodelijst_to_DaysOfWeek
title: WeekdagCodelijst to DaysOfWeek
description: Maps WeekDay codes as found in [zib InstructionsForUse v1.2.1 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/InstructionsForUse-v1.2.1(2020EN)) to `Timing.repeat.dayOfWeek` codes as found in FHIR R4.
